## About This Project

This blog explores the extraordinary Olympic career of Michael Phelps through interactive data visualizations and analytical storytelling. 

Michael Phelps is the most decorated Olympian of all time, with 28 Olympic medals including 23 golds. This project aims to bring his achievements to life through data-driven narratives.

## About the Data

All statistics are sourced from World Aquatics (formerly FINA) official records and the International Olympic Committee databases.

## Technologies Used

- **Quarto**: For creating this blog and interactive documents
- **R**: For data analysis and visualization
- **plotly/ggplot2**: For interactive charts
